resources.string: Financial health is a composite indicator that evaluates your current financial condition and resilience. It accounts for your savings rate, expense control, and the presence of an emergency fund.
Average expenses help you understand your spending dynamics. Daily, monthly, and yearly metrics are analyzed to reveal opportunities to optimize your budget.

An emergency fund is the amount that allows you to live without income for 3–6 months. It is calculated as average monthly expenses × number of months. This is your safety buffer for unforeseen events.
Do not exceed the budget 3 months

Study the possibilities of the application
Your personal assistant for financial management
Easily add transactions and track your finances in real time
Get detailed statistics and visualization of your financial data
Create budgets by categories and control your expenses
Your data is stored only on the device and protected by encryption
Quick access to balance information directly from the main screen
Money under control will help you manage personal finances
Easily add transactions and control your expenses
Get detailed statistics and plan the budget
All data is stored only on your device
List of libraries used in the "Money under control" application
All libraries are used in accordance with their licenses.Full texts of licenses are available on the websites of library developers.
Protect your data with a pin code
Confirm your identity to enter the application
The PIN code must contain at least 4 digits
Set up biometric authentication in the device settings
The biometric scanner is not available
This will reduce the safety of your data
Analyze what the most money is spent on and optimize your expenses.
See how your expenses and income from a month to a month change - look for trends!
A comprehensive assessment of your financial health based on key indicators

• Savings rate: 10–20%
• Emergency fund: 3–6 months of expenses
• Expense control: ≤90% of income
• Income diversification: ≥2 sources
• Regular analysis: weekly

• Set aside 10–20% of each income
• Track all expenses
• Build a 3–6 month emergency fund
• Diversify income sources
• Review finances weekly
Based on the analysis of your finance
Use analytics to set financial purposes and track progress.
Study your financial habits through graphs and analytics - this will help make more conscious decisions!
Check how many months you can live on your savings is your financial buffer.

1. Enter the Alfa-Bank 
2 application.Select a card or account 
3.Click on the "extract" icon (icon of the document) 
4.Indicate the period of discharge 
5.Click "Form" 
6.After the formation, click "Download" 
7.Select the XLSX format (Excel) 
8.Save the file to the device 
9.Import this XLSX file into our application

1. Enter the Alfa-Bank online 
2 personal account.Select an account or card 
3.Click on the "extract" 
4 button.Indicate the period of discharge 
5.Click "Form an extract" 
6.Select the "Excel" 
7 format.Click "Download" 
8.Import a downloaded XLSX file to our application
Our application supports direct imports of Excel files (.xlsx) from Alfa Bank.Just select a downloaded file, and all transactions will be automatically recognized.

5,2025-03-26_06-37-11, salary, 50 545 ₽, income, note to transaction, cash \n48,2025-03-26_05-42-11, products, 3 149 ₽, consumption, note to transaction, cash
An example of the contents of the file:
CSV format check. First line: %1$s. Separator: \"%2$s\". Valid: %3$s

1. The first line may contain columns 
2. The structure of the CSV file should contain the following columns:
 - Column 1: ID or operation number
 - Column 2: Date in the yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss format
 - Column 3: Description or category
 - Column 4: Amount (with currency symbol)
 - Column 5: Operation type (Income/Expense)
 - Column 6: Note (optional)
 - Column 7: Source (optional)
Not enough columns. Expected at least %1$d, got %2$d. Line: %3$s
Make sure the date format corresponds to yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss. Column separator is a comma.

• Columns: date, amount, category
• Separator: comma or semicolon
• Encoding: UTF-8
• Example: 01.01.2023,1000,Groceries
Skipping transaction due to invalid status: \"%1$s\". Valid: %2$s. Line: %3$s
Skipping line due to insufficient number of columns: %1$s

Are you sure you want to delete the source "%1$s"?

1. Enter the OZON Bank 
2 application.Select a card or account 
3.Go to the "More" tab (at the bottom of the screen) 
4.Select "Get a Help" 
5.Select "On the movement of funds" 
6.Select the Russian language 
7.Choose an account by which an extract 
8 is needed.Indicate the period of discharge (for example, the last month) 
9.Select the type of operations (recommend "all operations") 
10.Click "Form" 
11.After the formation, click "Download pdf" 
12.Save the file to the device 
13.Import this PDF file into our application

The date of the operation (MSC), the date of processing¹ and the authorization code, the category, the description of the operation, the amount in the account currency, the amount in the currency, the operation of theress, the rest of the funds, in the currency of the account

1. Enter the Sberbank 
2 application.Click on a card on which you need an extract 
3.Click on the "Details" button (three points in the upper right corner) 
4.Select the "Office on the account" 
5.Indicate the period for which the 
6 extract is needed.Click "Form an extract" 
7.After the formation, click "Download pdf" 
8.Save the file to the device 
9.Import this PDF file into our application
Our application supports direct import of Sberbank PDF statements. Just select a downloaded PDF file and the app will automatically recognize transactions.
Select a wallet for writing off

1. Enter the Tinkoff 
2 application.Select a card or account 
3.Click on three points in the upper right corner 
4.Select the "extract and certificates" 
5.Select the "Office on the account" 
6.Choose a period of extract (for example, for the last month) 
7.Click "Order an extract" 
8.Wait for the formation of an extract (usually takes several minutes) 
9.Open the receipt received and click on the "share" 
10 on the icon.Save the PDF file for the 
11 device.Import the saved file into our 
 
 application automatically recognizes the new Tinkoff statement format and correctly imports all transactions.
